languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Мы происходим из одного источника, элантах. Мы делим одну кровь... пускай кровь Темных и исказилась, а их души иссякли. Это данность, от которой нельзя отмахнуться".

{n}For a few seconds, Yrliet is silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot simply be brushed aside."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Мы происходим из одного источника, элантах. Мы делим одну кровь... пускай кровь Темных и исказилась, а их души иссякли. Это данность, от которой нельзя отмахнуться".

traits.locale_text: {n}For a few seconds, Yrliet stays silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot he simply bushed aside."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默半晌。{/n}“我们同宗同源，外界人。尽管黑暗灵族的血脉已经扭曲，灵魂已经腐朽，可我们原本一脉相承……这是不可否认的事实。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a few seconds, Yrliet is silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot simply be brushed aside."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默半晌。{/n}“我们同宗同源，外界人。尽管黑暗灵族的血脉已经扭曲，灵魂已经腐朽，可我们原本一脉相承……这是不可否认的事实。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se queda callada durante unos segundos.{/n} «Provenimos del mismo origen, elantach. Compartimos la misma sangre... incluso aunque la sangre de los Drukhari esté contaminada y sus almas estén vacías. Es un hecho que no se puede obviar».
languages.original_text: {n}For a few seconds, Yrliet is silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot simply be brushed aside."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se queda callada durante unos segundos.{/n} «Provenimos del mismo origen, elantach. Compartimos la misma sangre... incluso aunque la sangre de los Drukhari esté contaminada y sus almas estén vacías. Es un hecho que no se puede obviar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse quelques secondes.{/n} « Nos origines sont les mêmes, elantach. Nous partageons le même sang... même si celui des Drukharis est souillé et que leurs âmes sont étiolées. C'est un fait que nous ne pouvons pas démentir. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a few seconds, Yrliet is silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot simply be brushed aside."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse quelques secondes.{/n} « Nos origines sont les mêmes, elantach. Nous partageons le même sang... même si celui des Drukharis est souillé et que leurs âmes sont étiolées. C'est un fait que nous ne pouvons pas démentir. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Wir haben die gleiche Abstammung, Elantach. Wir teilen dasselbe Blut ... auch wenn das Blut der Drukhari deformiert ist und ihre Seelen leer sind. Das bleibt eine Tatsache, die sich nicht einfach wegwischen lässt."
languages.original_text: {n}For a few seconds, Yrliet is silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot simply be brushed aside."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Wir haben die gleiche Abstammung, Elantach. Wir teilen dasselbe Blut ... auch wenn das Blut der Drukhari deformiert ist und ihre Seelen leer sind. Das bleibt eine Tatsache, die sich nicht einfach wegwischen lässt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}数秒間、ユリエットは沈黙した。{/n}「エランタ、我らは同じ血をわかち合っている…たとえデュカーリの血が歪んでいて、彼らの魂で空虚であるとしても。これは単に無視できない事実なのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}For a few seconds, Yrliet is silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot simply be brushed aside."

traits.locale_text: {n}数秒間、ユリエットは沈黙した。{/n}「エランタ、我らは同じ血をわかち合っている…たとえデュカーリの血が歪んでいて、彼らの魂で空虚であるとしても。これは単に無視できない事実なのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, birkaç saniyeliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Aynı soydan geliyoruz elantach. Aynı kanı paylaşıyoruz. Drukharilerin kanı bozuk, ruhları ıssız olsa da... Bu gerçeği görmezden gelemem."
languages.original_text: {n}For a few seconds, Yrliet is silent.{/n} "We come from the same source, elantach. We share the same blood... even though the Drukhari's blood is distorted and their souls empty. It is a fact that cannot simply be brushed aside."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet birkaç saniyeliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Aynı soydan geliyoruz elantach. Aynı kanı paylaşıyoruz. Drukharilerin kanı bozuk, ruhları ıssız olsa da... Bu gerçeği görmezden gelemem."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
